11122.content:
It was another late night at Wilko for John, who had to stay late cleaning the Men’s restroom due to a customer throwing up all over a urinal and sink because of some bad sushi they ate before they got to the store. Better yet, it all occurred 5 minutes before the closing shift ended.

Go figure!

It was tough and grimy work that John had to do, but he enjoyed it. The instant satisfaction/gratification you get after seeing something you’ve cleaned/fixed was always a rewarding feeling to him. Plus, he liked the people he saw everyday, as they always treated with fairly so he did the same.

“And that should take care of that” he said as he finished mopping the last of the puke off the floor.

He wiped the sweat from his brow, and checked his watch.

12:45 a.m.

Normally he’d take the day shift, just so that his wife wouldn’t worry about him coming home so late, but he switched shifts with one of the younger guys who had a date tonight.

“Whelp, I’d better be getting back to Amanda, she’s probably still up waiting for me”

He wringed the mop in the bucket, when he noticed a smudge on one of the tiles on the wall.

“The poor bastard went full exorcist on this bathroom, he even hit the walls” John chuckled to himself, pulling a rag from his back pocket to scrub it.

At first, he lightly scrubbed it because it appeared not to be too dry or bonded with with the tile.

That failed, so he exerted a bit more force to get this tough stain out of the tile.

“What in the hell?” John said, being frustrated by this stubborn stain on the wall.

John put all his weight behind his hand and scrubbed his hardest against the stain, when suddenly, the tile clicked and retracted into the wall.

“Oops.”

From there, various clicking noises could be heard from behind the wall. John took a step toward the wall and put his ear up to it, just to confirm that he was in fact hearing these noises.

Just then, the wall split into two halves, and opened up into a dark room. John stumbled into the room as he was totally caught off guard, not knowing the wall was basically going to give out in him. He felt to his hands and knees, letting out an audible cry as he hadn’t taken a fall that hard since he was a teenager.

“Christ almighty” he said to himself, looking down at his before sitting upward and rubbing them together.

John looked up and seen that the room was pitch black, and all he could see was a pedestal, with what seemed to be a glowing orb hanging over it.

He couldn’t quite explain it, but he felt as if he was being called to the orb. To spring up onto his feet and race to embrace it. Despite this feeling, he slowly stood up, dusted himself off, and crept slowly toward the ball of light.

As he drew closer, he thought he could hear faint whispers coming from the direction of the orb, but discredited that due to his lack of belief in things of such matters.

Soon enough, John was right in front of the pedestal and the whispers grew louder. There were faintly engraved words on the pedestal, and they weren’t visible until John dusted them off with his hand.

“le....pouvoir.....de wilko? What the hell is that? French?” John thought out loud.

“Oui”

John looked up quickly to see the source of the reply, as now a hooded figure appeared on the other side of the pedestal.

The figure spoke broken English with a French accent, “John, as I have watched, your services you give Wilko are irreplaceable. Please, allow, me to offer this blessing, pour ton travail acharné”.

“What’re you talking about mate? Are you feeling funny?” John said, confused and a bit scared.

“Ah ah, Monsieur John. I am as you say, serious. Many service Wilko for generations, and this gift is for those of service” the figure said.

The orb then started to pulsate, and the whispers grew louder and louder in John’s ears.

Sweat drops began to form on John’s forehead, “What sort of gift?”.

The figure chuckled, as his voice deepened as he spoke. “The whispers you hear are from all. With this power, you are free to manipulate all and their vessels”.

Before John could question the figure, the orb produced a sublime and blinding light that caught him by surprise and forced John to cover his eyes. The orb then shot into John’s chest, rendering him breathless.

Just as he was about to pass out, he heard the figure whisper in his ear, “Manipulate the vessels of others as you please, or even your own for that matter. Farewell, fellow serviceman of Wilko”.

John later woke up:

111223.content:
Dun Dun Dun

A faint knocking noise caused John to open his eyes sluggishly, as if he was awaking from a deep sleep.

A voice then accompanied it, with both noises growing louder as he came to.

“John? Are you in there?” the familiar voice called out

“Huh? W-what, Uh, er yes! Come inside!” He sputtered out, still disoriented as to where he was or what was happening.

The source of the voice peeked their head in, and John looked up to see that it was the store manager, Emma.

Is everything alright John? I just wanted to check in to see if you were feeling okay. Some of the employees said that you seemed lackluster and “zombie-like” when you came in this morning” she explained.

John quickly focused in on the situation at hand, “Walked in? To here?”. He looked around to locate where he actually was. “Shit I’m in the office, but how did I-“

His train of thought was interrupted by Emma, “If you’re not feeling well or not in the mood for today, you can take it off John. I’ve had plenty of days where work just wasn’t in the stars, so I called in. Hell, I won’t even subtract one of your PTO’s!”

As he grew more coherent, John felt better and even started to look better than before. The color in his face was a bit flushed but now it had became visible again. However, he could not remember coming into work that morning, or even making it home after his shift last night for that matter.

“So just let me know in a bit how you’re feeling!” Emma said as she smiled a friendly smile at John, and headed out of his doorway.

“I’ll let you know in a bit Em. Thank you”.

Now that he was alone, he could really ponder on tracing his steps. Apparently he made it to work, in a different jumpsuit from yesterday which meant that he made it home and showered. But before that? He was drawing a blank.

He was cleaning the Men’s bathroom, and...

John’s eyes grew wide.

“That fuckin wall!” He said out loud, quickly rising from his desk and heading for the door.

——————————————-

John inspected the wall of the restroom just as he did the night before. He pushed against every tile he could, and none of them performed like last night.

“This is so crazy” he said to himself, exhaling as he put his hands on his hips. He stepped forward to the sink, and splashed his face with some cold water to really wake himself up and get the neurotransmitters firing.

John looked up at the mirror and let out a small shriek. In his mirror, was not his reflection, but that hooded figure that he had met the night before!

“What the hell? How’re you doin this?” John asked, unsure whether to be terrified or impressed.

“I am capable of incredible things Monsieur John.”

It was odd, even in the well light bathroom, John was unable to see the figures face. It was almost as if the hood itself was a black hole with a voice coming out of it.

“And so are you!”

“What was that? Me?” questioned John.

“Like I said last night, manipulate the vessels of others as you please, or even your own”

“Yeah but what does that even mean? You’re talking all this mumbo-jumbo and I don’t even understand any of it.”

The figure chuckled, “Oh John, you do humor me. If you see that somebody has something you want, you may swap it out for something you have. Or you see somebody needs something, you may gift them somebody else’s”.

“So like...presents?” John asked, still confused and a bit creeped out that he was talking into a mirror.

“Oh no no no Monsieur John. You have no hair, yes?”

John patted the top of his head, feeling his bald spot. “Yeah i guess”, he grumbled.

“This is true. But Michaęl has nice hair, oui?”

The thought of Michael and his neatly combed hair popped into John’s mind. It seemed so thick and well groomed at all times, that John couldn’t help but feel jealous in comparison to what he had.

“I guess he does, yeah”

“You may simply swap yours, for his. Just think about it, and it will be so.” the figure explained.

John looked back up at the mirror to retort the figures claim, but all he seen was his reflection. The figure was gone.

His eyes shot up to his scalp, one that was once full of nice long and healthy locks was not riddled to nothing but a wasteland of hair and scalp. He could feel a mixture of emotions building in his stomach as he thought about it, but the figures words rang through his mind.

“Ah what the hell, why not try what he’s sayin” John thought to himself.

He looked at his scalp, and thought about Michael’s well kept hair in its place.

Nothing initially happened, causing John to chuckle and turn away from the mirror, when something caught his eye.

Darks strands of hair started to slowly appear on his head, and soon enveloped his entire scalp. It then grew out and rested on his head, very similar to.....Michael’s haircut.

“Whoa what the fuck!” John said in disbelief, unable to process the change in front of his eyes. He rummaged his fingers through his hair to confirm what he was seeing, and it was true.

Somehow, someway, he had swapped Michael’s hair with his own.

He hadn’t had a full head of hair in years, and he wasn't quite sure how to react to it.

“Wait” he thought to himself, “that means Michael got my hair, shit”.

——————————————-

John walked through the aisles searching for Michael, to see what his reaction would be to seeing his hair on John’s head. He eventually found him showing a customer where the batteries were, and there it was.

John’s balding hair on full display on-top of Michael’s head.

Michael stepped away from the customer, and John approached him.

“Uh, hey Michael, how ya doin?”

“John what’s up! I was actually gonna ask Liz to radio you. Some kid dropped a carton on milk in the refrigerated section.”

“Oh, uh okay. I’ll jump right to that. I was actually gonna ask if you’d gotten a haircut recently” John asked, trying not to stare at his former hair follicles.

“Thanks, and no I haven’t. I’ve been trying to grow it out a bit taut I’ve just been losing so much hair lately that I might just go bald. I was hoping to have a full head of hair like yours in my forties but that’s just how genes work I guess” Michael answers, rubbing his hair.

John fought to not let his jaw drop. So apparently, when he made these changes, nobody but him would be aware of what occurred. He couldn’t help but laugh, but quickly swallow it to not appear odd in front of Michael.

“Well I just wanted to check in with you Mike, I’ll go mop that up right now”.

John walked away with a smile on his face, as his brain gradually thought of other improvements to his life he could make

What happened next?

1112233.content:
Questions and ideas poured into John’s mind as he headed toward the refrigerated area of the store, thinking of what he was now capable of with this new bestowed power. He knew that he could change his own life with it, but what about those around him? The figure did briefly mention about the “vessels of others” so did that mean he was free to change others as well? He needed to experiment, and see his power at work firsthand.

He scanned the aisles are he walked through the store, searching for two guinea pigs he could attempt to change. He soon stopped in his tracks when he caught two of his co-workers chatting while stocking shelves, and they couldn’t be any different.

It was Claire, and Allie. It was clear that Claire had been assisting Allie in stocking up the higher shelves, as Allie was too short to even reach them. Claire’s 5’10 frame really helped out around the store, and her co-workers as well. Allie was about 5’0, so you could definitely miss her sometimes when searching for somebody. Her height was somewhat of a disadvantage when working at a department store, but she made up for it for being a hard-worker with an enjoyable personality.

The two women were gossiping about some show that they both had interest in, and their opinions on what the next season may consist of. John knew nothing of the sort, although it sounded like something that his wife or daughter may be interested in.

John stepped back into the aisle adjacent to them, so that he was able to hear what they were saying, but not be seen.

“Yeah, that cliffhanger at the end really duped me! But the end credit scene sort of set up part of the next season!” Allie told Claire.

“End credit scene! I didn’t even know that was a thing! I’m so bad at just skipping over little things like that. Some fan I am” Claire sighed.

As the two of them continued to yak on about their interests, John focused in on what he could change about them. Suddenly, the inspiration hit him.

“Their legs! One's tall, and the other's small! I suppose I could try and flip em around.” John said to himself, half excitedly.

He took his feather duster out from his waistband, and entered the aisle that the two women were in. He used that to act like he was dusting some of the shelves, just to witness this change himself, if possible.

Upon seeing the custodian, Claire and Allie both greeted him and exchanged happy looks with him, before returning to their conversation.

John returned the favor, and begun to fake dust the shelves. He looked over at the two women, and said under his breath, “Here goes nothing”.

He envisioned Claire with Allie's stumpy legs and round butt, and Allie with Claire’s long, never ending legs and flat rear.

He didn’t notice anything immediately, but after a few glances back in their direction, he could see that the two of them were slowly meeting face to face without the knowledge of what was happening to them. Allie and Claire weren’t staring in his direction, so he begun to give his undivided attention to the transformation he set forth.

Claire’s pant legs were beginning to become baggy at her ankles, whereas Allie’s skinny jeans rose to about her mid-calf area. Given the exchange of legs/height, Allie now had to be at least 5’8, while Claire had shrunk down to being 5’1. Lastly, as he had a perfect view of Claire’s back, John could see the back of her pants filling up with Allie’s ample rear. Her slim trousers stretched outward as they tried to accommodate her new asset.

“Lord almighty what have I done” John thought to himself after witnessing his power at work.

He heard their conversation change somewhat, after he made the change, as Claire seemed a bit more grateful for Allie’s presence.

“I’m lucky you came around when you did Allie, I would’ve needed to grab a ladder from the back”.

“It’s all good! I put ‘reaching high places’ as one of my strengths on the application” Allie joked.

John turned away from the two of them and semi-sped walk out of the aisle, in disbelief at what he’d just done.

“So not only did I change their legs, I changed their minds too! Geez if I could get clothes to fit too it’d be perfect!” John said to himself.

He then felt a buzz on his waist, his walkie-talkie. It was:

He left the area of the store where Allie and Claire had been, as they’d carried on in their tasks as normal, without any problems due to their swapped legs. He walked towards his workspace, grabbed his bag of tools from the shelf, and headed on over to Liz’s office space.

He never realized how long of a trip it was to the office until he had to lug his tools around. They weren’t profoundly heavy, but heavy enough to make him break a sweat.

“Guess I ain’t built like I used to” John said to himself, concentrating on walking forward without dropping his tools.

When he reached the foot of the stairs, he examined them up and down, and sighed to himself.

“Guess this’ll be my workout for the day” he said half-heartedly.

When he walked in, Liz was sitting on the floor, trying to comprehend the instruction manual to the best of her ability. She’d already separated all the pieces, and made note of what went where.

“Ah! The man of the hour!” Liz said happily as John appeared in the doorway, “I can’t make heads or tails of these instructions”.

“Good to see you Liz”, he smiled before setting his tools down. “Let me take a look at that before you pop a blood vessel”.

Liz handed John the manual and he slowly looked over it, understanding what tools he needed and where to assemble the pieces. He then sat down on the floor directly across from Liz, and begun putting together the desk.

He’d call out for different pieces and Liz would scramble trying to find them amongst the pulled piles she’d made, as she tried to remain useful during this task. John could’ve done it alone, but it was nice to have the company when doing something like this.

“So how’s Amanda and the kids? Brendon’s really sprouted since the last time Amanda brought them by the store” Liz asked.

“They doing pretty well, same ol same ol” John said as he drilled one of the desk legs in place, “And if feels like Brendon’s growing everyday. He’s nearly as tall as I am”.

Liz smiled at that, “I know how you feel, as I watch Ethan. His brain and body just won’t stop growing. I want him to be my little baby forever” she cooed.

John shared a laugh with Liz, and in the meantime, he got a really good look at the assistant manager. She had her hair tied up in a high ponytail, to prevent it from getting in her face at this time. She’d taken off her heels, and her suit jacket to try and deal with the manpower that assembling this desk took. She had rolled her sleeves up too, just to really look like she was full handywoman mode.

As Liz continued to blabber on about her young son, John couldn’t help but take a peek down at her extra-large bosom. “...and then he threw the bowl of spaghetti at me! What a crazy kid right?!” Liz laughed, interrupting John’s thoughts and his line of sight.

“Oh! Yeah! Hahaha, kids are funny” John fake-laughed, appearing to have been listening for the past few minutes.

Just as Liz was about to bring up another lame story about her kindergartener, John stood up and lifted the desk in its correct position.

“That should do it luv!” He said as he patted the desktop.

“Wow thank you so much John! I wouldn’t have been able to do this without you or your help! How can I repay you?”

When presented with that with that question , initially, some questionable thoughts definitely filled his mind but were cleared almost immediately when he realized who he was talking to. Two thoughts reminded, and he decided to act upon one of them.

“Maybe lunch on you? I think I forgot what Amanda packed me in the fridge at home” John admitted.

“Say less! Lets go down and grab something. I’ve feeling like a good club sandwich with some soup” Liz said happily.

The duo walked out of Liz’s office space and headed down to the store floor to go get their lunch. They made their way though the thick of it all, when somebody called out to Liz.


Kiran.


“Liz! Liz! Wait up!” she called out as she slow jogged over to here and John.

“Hey there luv, what’s the matter?” Liz inquired.

“Well, I was stocking this item and the item's price tag didn’t match the one from last week so I.....”

As Kiran went deeper into her situation, the more John tuned her out. The more he tuned out their conversation, the better his second idea from before sounded. He had briefly thought about the swap that he had made before, and believed that Liz would be the perfect subject to swap something from. But what to swap? And from who? Liz had a lot of great attributes to choose from, and he wanted to find another candidate on this small lunch trip. Luckily, Kiran stumbled upon them.

Kiran was virtually the opposite of Liz, physically. She was very petite whereas Liz had extra weight in most places where it mattered. Liz was quite bustier (obviously), and had quite a bit more meat on her rear. Liz also was a bit taller, but her heels really made the difference between them show. This just made John more than willing to make another swap occur.

What does John decide to swap between Liz and Kiran?

11531.content:
Jenny rolled her eyes and kissed her teeth as she watched Freddie and Imogen spring off in the direction of the store, bumping shoulders and mercilessly teasing each other as they did so. She hadn’t the energy nor the willpower to go off chasing behind them. It sounded bad on paper but she had no qualms with them screwing around and having their little ‘playtime’—at least as long as it didn’t affect her directly. Ever since that fateful day when she’d popped off for a nap and the two kids had accidentally-on-purpose taken the trait-swapping serum for themselves, they’d done little more than bug her with tales of their swapping antics or pleas to trade things with her herself.

“Sorry, Rotherham,” she mumbled to herself as she adjusted the mocha-brown poncho on her slight frame, “But it’s your turn to deal with those brats.” She pushed open the doors of the salon with much ease, breathing in the scent of shampoo and bath salts and sighing contentedly. A spa retreat was exactly what she needed right now. Moments after she’d walked inside a lady, complete in a spotless white masseuse outfit and sparkly heeled-loafers, approached her, her hands tucked behind her back and a disingenuous smile plastered on her face.

“Good afternoon, ma’am,” she said in a delicate American intonation, “My name is Nat and can I just wish you a very warm welcome from all of us staff at Beautylicious!” Jenny chuckled awkwardly. She couldn’t tell if it was the lady’s American origin or if she was on something but she was unusually perky for someone who probably worked on minimum wage. In England she’d learnt one thing; never trust a person that’s uber-happy after lunchtime.

Jenny sized up the lady: she wasn’t really anything special, at least not in Jenny’s eyes, an inch or two shorter than her at 5’5” with a decent figure and bust size (a C-cup, to be precise). The only noticeable features really were her vibrantly dyed blue-ish green hair pulled into a loose braid and her punk-ish tattoos and piercings, one of which was a small hoop going through the flesh around her precisely plucked dark eyebrow. Jenny admired the craftsmanship above her eyes very much and, not being one to want to experience the painful plucking process, decided it’d be much easier to take the girl’s for herself.

It took hardly any effort to do so, just a flash of a thought sent her stomach churning, her head spinning and her eyes lolling backwards. Crap, she mumbled as she stumbled slightly. Though she could perform much more extravagant swaps, the inconvenient (but not all that detrimental) toll on her body was always the same. In some ways she was envious of her children’s effortless indifference to the momentary disorientation. Nevertheless, as she regained her composure, she smirked as she reached up and stroked her new pierced eyebrow, feeling the digit of the little slit that Nat had etched into it.

She pulled a small compact from her purse and marvelled at the style of it—sure, the black eyebrows contrasted with the rest of her dusty blonde hair but she could always swap the colour back later. Jenny looked back up. The beautician’s assistant still stood diligently by the entrance, albeit looking a bit restless from Jenny’s inactivity.

“Thank you very much, Nat,” Jenny purred. “You’re a perky one, aren’t you!”

“I’d like to think so, ma’am! How may I be of service for you today?”

Jenny’s eyes roamed the room. Sitting and waiting patiently in various stages of boredom were a wide age range of women, some of them with husbands, partners, children and various other acquaintances. However in Jenny’s eyes they were all unsuspecting meatbags that she could manipulate to alleviate her pent-up stresses.

“You’re the beautician, you tell me.” Nat smiled and gestured for Jenny to follow her to the front desk and book an appointment, unknowingly guaranteeing that her eyebrows would not be the only feature of hers that would been changed today.

Normally she'd be back on her computer. Right now she was far too excited to play Solitaire. She wanted to make use of the earrings but she wasn't sure how.

She decided she needed a brief distraction and chose to touch up her make up. She opened her desk drawer and pulled out the vanity mirror she kept in there. As she applied the make up, she looked at her face. She didn't think of herself as old yet but she knew she wasn't young any more. She looked at the crows feet at the corners of her eyes and the few wrinkles around her mouth.

She ran her fingers through her dark hair. She had to dye it more regularly now to stop the grey creeping through. She thought about how much longer it took to get over an illness or a hangover for that matter. Emma suspected she had started to go through the early stages of the menopause, having the occasional hot flush. She felt like time was slowly catching up with her. "It would be great to be a young again." She said out loud to herself.

A wicked idea suddenly popped into her head. She put the mirror away. Emma pulled out her mobile phone and called her daughter Alice.

Alice was currently at home in the living room, sitting on the sofa, watching television and eating her breakfast. Her phone began ringing. "Hi mum. What's up?" She asked as she answered it.

"I was wondering if you could pop by work luv. I may have a lead on a job for you." Alice was currently 'looking' for a temporary summer job before starting university. She yawned in response.

"Yeah, I'll be there in couple of hours." She said sleepily.

"No, you need to come as soon as possible. The interview is today. I just found out about it." Emma lied.

"Oh okay."

"You should wear that outfit I got you."

"What the mini-me one?" She laughed at the derisory term she used for the outfit that resembled her mother's work clothes. It consisted of black trousers and a white blouse.

"It's professional." Emma insisted. Maybe it was a step too far she thought. She was starting to have doubts about this plan.

"Not exactly trendy though. I'm kind of in the middle of something right now anyway."

"I'm sure you can afford to miss an episode of This Morning." Emma told her referring to the daytime talk show.

"It's Homes Under the Hammer actually."

Emma sighed. "The point is you're wasting your whole day away doing nothing."

"It's just gone ten o'clock. That's hardly the whole day."

"And I've been up since seven." Emma really didn't want to get angry with her. The poor girl was just relaxing after finishing school. She couldn't blame her for that. Emma was starting to reconsider her whole plan. She calmed herself down. "There's more to life to sitting in your PJs, watching daytime TV and eating cornflakes."

"I'm not," Alice insisted, "it's Weetabix." This instantly angered Emma again.

"You know the Weetabix is mine." Emma was annoyed by the cheek of the girl, stealing it. This decided it for Emma. Her plan was going ahead.

"I fancied a change." Me as well, Emma thought.

"Well if you got a job you could buy your own bloody Weetabix." Emma told her in the well established tone of a parent. Alice mimicked her nagging silently. "And stop making faces." She told her after using her parental telepathy.

"Yes mum." Alice said with only the slightest hint of sarcasm. "I'll get the bus, should be there in about an hour or so."

"This is urgent. Get a taxi and wear the outfit." Emma changed to a sweet tone. "See you soon, luv you." She hung up.

---

Alice stepped into the manager's office just under an hour later. Emma who had been waiting impatiently, closed her computer and stood up to talk to her.

"Hi Honey." Emma said in a friendly manner as she looked at Alice in her business suit.

"I hope this job is worth it. I feel silly in these clothes." Alice told her as she looked at their nearly identical outfits. Emma frowned.

"Bad news I'm afraid. They already hired someone. One of their temps it seems."

"Oh great. All this effort for nothing." Alice said as she put down her hand bag on the desk. "You could have phoned. Where was it for?"

Emma thought of something on the spot. "Our store in Barnsley." Emma said in that unique way all people from Yorkshire say Barnsley.

"Sounds like I dodged a bullet. I'm glad I'm not going to Barnsley every day. Well, if I hurry back I might catch Bargain Hunt."

"No! Don't run off." Emma said pulling out the earrings. "I picked these up today. They are antiques. I thought you could tell me what you thought." She handed one to Alice. She looked at it.

"They are kind of pretty, I guess."

"Model it for me."

"My piercings have sealed up. I need them redone."

"I know luv. I think these earrings have a special attachment. Just try please." Emma insisted. Alice shrugged with her eyebrows and put the earring to her ear.

"Oh, wow. It does attach." Emma instantly felt the compulsion to put on the other earring. She didn't resist. Everything went fuzzy.

Emma looked down and saw the other earring in her hand. She looked up and found herself facing herself. It was such a strange sensation she could barely keep a straight face.

"What's so funny, mum?" Alice asked in Emma's middle-aged voice. She picked up her own handbag. Emma noticed, finding it interesting that the hand bag's ownership didn't swap.

"Nothing." She lied, in her new voice. She grabbed her own handbag and pulled out her purse. She noticed Alice's nails were unvarnished. She reached in and pulled out a twenty pound note. "This is for your taxis. Get yourself some lunch with change." Alice took the note.

"Thanks mum." Alice responded.

Emma sat down behind the desk and opened her computer. She looked up. "I'll see you later." She returned to looking at her computer indicating that the conversation was over. Alice turned round and walked out closing the door behind her.

Emma leaned back on her seat, in her new young body and smiled.
134151.title: Emma figures out a way to use the earrings to h...

choices: Stefania comes into the office.  She is not happy.
1341511.content:
"Time for a bit of an appraisal, I think." Emma said out loud. It still made her feel giddy talking in this new voice. She pulled her mirror out her drawer again. She spent several minutes examining her new face. She was familiar with it of course but she'd never seen it from this angle before.

She noted Alice's facial resemblance to her own. It seemed even more noticeable now. Many family members had commented on how much Alice looked like a younger version of her mother. In fact she clearly remembered someone using the word clone as a joke. That suited Emma just fine. If you were to get a younger body and you were generally happy with your looks surely you'd want some familiarity.

She found it quite difficult to tell if she had her original eyes. Like her facial features Alice's eye colour was similar to Emma's. On closer inspection though, she was fairly sure she had kept the originals. They just looked 'older'.

She spent quite a bit of time making faces in the mirror. She finished by pursing her lips several times and giggling each time.

She put the mirror down and ran her fingers through her hair. It felt silkier than her own. Emma was also aware it hadn't been damaged by years of dye treatment. In fact she couldn't remember Alice ever dying it. She didn't like her hair down though, especially when she was working. She reached into the drawer and pulled out her spare scrunchy. She quickly styled the hair into a pony tail. "Much better." She said to nobody again.

As she put the mirror back in the drawer, she spotted her handbag. As that hadn't swapped with Alice she was curious about the contents. She opened it. It seemed to be all her own stuff. She opened her purse and pulled out her driving licence. There on the pink piece of plastic was a photo of Alice with Emma's name next to it. She looked at the Date of Birth. It was the same as Alice's. As far as the world knew Emma was a few weeks shy of her eighteenth birthday.

She was even more surprised when she saw the date the licence was issued. It was eight years ago. "How the hell does that work?" Emma asked out loud. She wondered how a nine year old girl got a driving licence. It seemed the earrings could change more than just memories.

She put the licence away. She knew she had to investigate the age thing more but for now she wanted to inspect the rest of her body. She pulled out the chair and stood up. She would have preferred a full length mirror but she could kind of see a reflection in the office window.

She didn't mind posing in front of it. The old Tesco across the river had been demolished a few years ago. All that was visible was the Wilko store roof. She couldn't resist the urge to feel her own breasts. She cupped them in her hands. She was a little disappointed Alice's seemed a little smaller than her own. She wasn't complaining though, she'd gained thirty years in age.

As she moved around she felt a different sensation. It felt like her underwear was digging into her ass crack. She slipped her fingers down to free the rogue knickers when she suddenly stopped. "Am I wearing a thong?" She asked out loud after feeling the fabric. She had to see. She quickly pulled her hand out and unfastened the trousers letting them drop to her knees.

They did indeed reveal a very skimpy teal coloured thong underneath them. She couldn't recall ever seeing thongs in Alice's laundry. She would have had something to say about it, if she had. That wasn't her only surprise. There on her hip just below her non-existent waistband was a tattoo. It was a small red heart. "When the hell did she get that?" She asked both amazed and annoyed.

As much as she felt she had a certain level of control in Alice's life, she was quickly learning there was a lot more going on than she was aware of. She slowly pulled the trousers back up.

She finished fastening them, just as Liz walked in the door Emma had forgotten to lock. She silently cursed herself for getting distracted by the contents of her trousers. She put it out of her mind for now and returned to manager mode. "You all right Emma?" Liz asked as she fiddled with the printer.

"Oh yes. How are you getting on with Steven?" She asked.

"It's Stefania now. I came up to print his, I mean her, name badge." She said as she loaded the name badge blank into the printer.

"Did you get her sorted out with a new uniform?" Emma asked.

"Eventually," Liz sighed. "She is a total diva. She didn't like any of the underwear I got her. Reckoned the bras chaffed her too much. My bras chafe too but you don't hear me complaining about it."

"Well this is what happens when a man is in a woman's body. They complain about all the stuff we take for granted."

"I know." Liz said as she opened the badge template on her computer. "Anyway she ended up dressed. Our uniforms aren't designed for ladies with his proportions. He's quite the sight."

"I can imagine. So how are you explaining our new staff member?" Emma asked.

"Oh we're telling everyone Steven has gone on a course. We're going to say Stefania's a trainee assistant supervisor who is getting sent to a different store." Liz explained.

"Not Parkgate or Meadowhall?" A worried Emma asked, referring to the two nearby stores in the out-of-town shopping centres. "The staff know loads of people from there. They'll find out." Liz shook her head.

"Don't panic. Barnsley." She said as the badge started printing.

Emma sighed with relief. "Thank goodness. Our staff wouldn't know anyone from there."

"Who would want to?" Liz asked rhetorically with a chuckle.

Emma was amazed that she could chat to Liz in Alice's body like normal and she was completely unaware. She was quickly getting used to experiencing a swap first hand. She decided to put the memory alteration to the test. "How many years have we worked together now Liz?" She asked.

Liz had a thoughtful look on her face as she stood up. "What's it been? Three or four years since you started here." She said as she walked over to the printer.

Emma nodded. "Yeah four years I think. I was pretty young back then."

"You sure were. I remember you could barely fill a bra when you started." She said laughing. Emma remembered Alice had been fairly flat chested till she got a growth spurt about three years ago.

"I still drove to work though, right?" Emma asked. Liz stopped and stared at her. Liz eyed her manager suspiciously. "Of course." She said slowly. Emma nodded.

"You've used them, haven't you?" Liz asked.

"What?"

"The earrings, you've used them. Standing there grinning and asking me strange questions." Liz correctly deduced.

"Maybe." Emma said grinning even more.

"I knew it. Oh my God, did you swap with me? Is that my body?" Liz asked.

"No."

"You would say that."

"Liz, you're being paranoid love." Emma reassured her. Liz still unconsciously stood away from her. "Look I'll prove it." Emma picked up the earrings and handed them to Liz. "Put these on and you'll know." Liz slipped them on her ears and the room went fuzzy.

"Alice?" Liz asked.
1341511.title: Continue with Emma

Follow Liz so she can organise a meeting for picking swap candidates
Stefania comes in begging for a swap
13415111.content:
"No it's still Emma." Emma told her.

"I thought I saw Alice leaving the store earlier. Are you telling me I saw her in your body?" Liz asked. Emma nodded.

"You should still see me as Emma though. We didn't swap, so how come the earrings are making you see the truth?" Emma asked a little confused.

"I guess we assumed a few things when we were doing the experiments with Stefania. It looks like anyone who wears the earrings sees the truth. The only person it seems to make a difference with, is the person who put on the second earring. They cancel it out for everyone." Liz deduced from what she'd seen.

"We'll have to take more care with who gets to wear them after a swap." Emma said.

"Why did you swap with Alice anyway?" Liz wondered.

"We are expecting the staff to swap for the good of the store. I wouldn't expect them to do anything I wasn't prepared to do myself." Emma said like a General talking about their troops.

"Why didn't you pick someone from the store? Is what I meant Emma."

"Well err, I thought it made sense to swap with a family member first. I thought it would be easier. This way I don't have to be an interloper in a family of strangers. I wouldn't have to locate the other person's house either." Emma felt she'd covered up her own selfish motivations pretty well with her explanation. She certainly wasn't going to mention the stolen Weetabix.

Liz nodded but still felt a bit cynical about Emma swapping with her teenage daughter. "So you aren't planning on swapping out before the end of shift then?"

"I don't want to call her in here again today. The last thing I want is for her to get suspicious. I can do it when I get home." She could see Liz wasn't convinced. "It's been a learning experience too. I've already found out..." She paused.

"What?" Liz asked now curious. Emma lowered her voice and leaned closer.

"Alice has got a tattoo." She leaned back and made a 'what do you think of that?' expression on her face.

Liz was a little surprised. "She's managed to keep that hidden from you?" Emma nodded. "Is it a boy's name or something juicy like that?" Liz asked.

"It's a heart on her hip, it must be nearly an inch across." Emma said trying to impress her assistant manager.

"That's hardly anything these days. Courtney's got a fire breathing dragon right across her..."

"Okay I don't need to know." After Liz's revelation, Emma considered she was a bit more out of touch with young people than she liked to admit. "That's the only one I've found so far anyway." She was feeling a little jealous now that she knew tattoos were commonplace.

"You mean, you are going to check? Don't you think that's, you know, a bit of an invasion of privacy."

"Changed days luv. Do you think Stefania cares about the privacy of the body she's in?"

"I suppose you're right. If someone's mind is in it, realistically the body belongs to them." Emma was pleased, Liz had came round to her way of thinking. "Speaking of you and Stefania, I thought the whole point of this was to increase the age of our staff."

"Yeah." Emma could see where this was going.

"We have forty members of staff here. You've lost, what thirty years," Emma nodded, "and Stefania has lost about fifteen. That's forty five years roughly. Between the pair of you, you've managed to knock the average of the staff down by over a year. We are going in the wrong direction."

"Wow, aiming to go work for corporate one day Liz?" Emma asked sarcastically. "You sure seem bothered by following their directives to the letter."

"No, I just don't want us to get into any more bother from them."

"As a manager I probably don't count and even if I do, I'm going to class this," she pointed at her body with both hands, "as a managerial perk." She could see the looks Liz was giving her. "We'll get it sorted out eventually. Don't get you knickers in a twist luv." Emma said as she sat back down at her desk.

"I don't know. I'm getting cold feet about all this now." Liz said worried about the way it was effecting Emma.

"You should try it. Swap with Courtney. At least you'll be doing something productive with her body. Look at Alice, if I hadn't swapped with her she'd be wasting her days away watching TV and stealing my Weetabix. Now her body is actually doing something constructive with its youth." Emma said as she started up Solitaire on the computer.

134151111.content:
Once she was sure Liz was away, Emma closed her computer down. She opened the drawer again to grab her vanity mirror. "You know I really should check this body for any more hidden surprises." She said to herself. She twisted her head in the other direction. "That sure sounds like a good idea Emma." She giggled as she stood up.

Luckily for Emma there was a small bathroom attached to the manager's office. The managers weren't expected to use the regular toilets. It was yet another symbol of the 'them and us' mentality of employers when it came to staff, in many large workplaces throughout the nation.

As a managerial perk though, it wasn't particularly impressive. It was tidy enough, John cleaned it personally, not that it required much cleaning as it was only used by two people in a shop with forty workers. It was pretty small though. It's contents were unimpressive, there was just a toilet and a hand basin with a mirror above it. It was usually illuminated by a small skylight covered in bird droppings. Luckily someone had the good sense to install an extractor fan near the skylight, so nasty aromas weren't an issue in the manager's office.

Emma looked into the tiny dingy room. She would never describe it as impressive but it was just about suitable for what she had in mind. She shut the door and locked it with a well worn snib. After putting the vanity mirror on the toilet cistern, she started undoing the buttons on her blouse.

---

On her way down the stairs Liz started to reconsider Emma's suggestion. She originally hadn't been keen on the idea of swapping with Courtney. It certainly wouldn't help with the staffing issue but why shouldn't she get herself a younger body too? It wasn't as big an age change for her either. Just fifteen years rather than thirty. The apparent issues Emma had with the generation gap wouldn't be as big a problem for her. The pros seem to add up in Liz's mind while the cons were rationalised away. She giggled at the thought of going all the way with the swap. Let Courtney be the one to deal with looking after her little brother. Liz would be free.

She was interrupted when she reached the bottom of the stairs. She could see a figure skulking in the shadows in a dark corner of the corridor. Liz mentally reminded herself to mention the broken light bulb to John yet again.

Letting her eyes adjust to the darker area she could make out the silhouette of the skulker. Actually it was pretty easy to recognise. "Stefania what are you doing?" Liz asked.

"How did you know it was me?" Stefania asked back, stepping out of the shadows.

"Seriously?" Liz asked as she glanced at Stefania's breasts. Stefania just stared back. "Apart from me you've got the biggest boobs in the store."

"Oh I see." She seemed a little distracted.

"And those nipples should come with a government warning. If Health and Safety saw them, they'd shut the store down or make us fit warning lights." Liz joked. Stefania stared off into space not responding. "So anyway, what you doing out here?"

"I was just taking a breather. Everything has been a bit, intense." She told her.

"The shop busy?" Liz asked. Stefania shook her head.

"No, it's just the guys have been keeping me really, occupied." She looked Liz in the eyes. "You know normally I can go a whole shift and nobody will come up to me. Usually I have to go chasing people. Today, I can barely turn around without one of the blokes being in my face with a price query or something."

"Really?" Liz asked pretending to be concerned but actually completely unsurprised.

"Once I tell them what they need to know, then they start asking me other questions that aren't work related."

"Nothing inappropriate I hope." Liz asked. Stefania shook her head.

"No. Stuff like, do I have a boyfriend? Do I have plans for the weekend? Do I prefer tall guys or short ones? Stupid stuff like that." Liz kept nodding sympathetically. "They've been complimenting me too. They keep saying things like, I'm the best supervisor they've ever had, I'm very understanding or telling me they like my uniform. They seem to get in my personal space more than they normally would too."

Liz couldn't believe Steven had got through forty one years of life with this level of naivety when it came to men's motives.

"Unfortunately it goes with being a woman. It shouldn't but it does."

"I really want to be a guy again. I need to track down my body or swap with another guy as soon as I can." Stefania's eyes were nearly tearing up.

"Patience, Stefania. I'm sure you can handle being female for a couple of days. I've managed it for nearly forty years."

"I'm worried Liz, I'm worried I'm going to start liking the attention."

---

Emma was currently naked in the small toilet. She had decided to strip completely down. This included her shoes and knee high pop socks. Her blouse and trousers hung on the hook on the back of the door. Her matching teal, thong and bra sat on the cistern. The tag on the bra had informed Emma she was now a B-cup.

She was bent over in an unusual position looking into the vanity mirror. She was trying to look at her back and bum in the reflection of the mirror above the hand basin. She carefully angled the mirror to see different parts of her body. Eventually she put her tired arms down. Her extensive examination had failed to find any other tattoos on Alice's body. After what Liz had told her earlier about their popularity, she was somewhat disappointed.

The only other major surprise was her bush, or the lack of one. She was completely shaved. This made perfect sense considering Alice's apparent fondness for thongs. This was a new experience for Emma, she'd never been shaved or waxed bald before. She turned round.

The wash basin mirror was surprisingly large. She could actually see a good amount of her naked body. Emma was actually becoming quite fond of the smaller breasts and nipples. She rubbed her hands and down her bare arms feeling the soft supple skin. She looked at her unpainted nails again. A trip to Beautylicious was definitely required.

She continued to look at Alice's pale alabaster skin. There seemed to be masses of it. A blank canvas almost. She fantasised about getting a tattoo herself. She immediately felt her pulse raise. She could hear the blood from her young heart pumping through her ears. She felt herself tingle all over. Her pussy seemed to be drawing her attention.

She grinned cheekily at herself as her reflected hand moved downwards and disappeared out of view in the hand basin mirror. "Oh I'm soooo naughty." Emma said in her sexiest voice. "Mmmm...." Her fingers made contact with the moist folds of skin. She closed her eyes. "Mmmm.... On company time too."
134151111.title: Emma waits for Liz to leave so she can explore ...

choices: Someone walks into the break room
1341511112.content:
Liz had taken Stefania to the break room to calm down. It had gone two o'clock already, so all the regular tea breaks were over for the day. It did cross Liz's mind that maybe she had been a bit hasty expecting Steven to adapt quite so quickly. He was genuinely struggling with all the male attention. His ego seemed surprisingly fragile.

Liz excused herself to go into the corridor. After all the soul searching, she was determined to get Courtney's body today. She called her on her mobile.

"Hi Liz." Courtney said. Liz could hear the sound of traffic in the background.

"Where are you?" Liz asked.

"Been shopping all day. I'm in town right now." Courtney informed her.

"Oh, what did you buy?" Liz asked, genuinely curious.

"Nothing, I'm skint." She said some what unhappily. Courtney had been looking for an excuse to get out the house and window shopping was the best idea she could come up with.

"Are you far away from my shop?" Liz asked her.

"Not too far."

"Do you think you can swing by. I need to talk to you about something." There was a pause.

"Sorry, I was crossing the road." Courtney said. "Can't it wait? We'll both be home in a couple of hours."

"No, it needs dealing with now." Liz said, becoming insistent.

"So you don't want dad to know then?" It was a logically conclusion for Courtney to come to. Liz didn't want Eric to know but she really hadn't thought about that part when she contacted Courtney.

"Just come by the shop. I'll explain everything then."

---

Ten minutes later Courtney entered the store. Liz met her just inside the main door.

Liz had planned on doing the swap in the manager's office. When she went up to retrieve the earrings she'd heard sexual moaning from the toilet. She left a quick note for Emma while she was there. She'd explained she'd taken the earrings. Liz left the office as quickly as possible, not wishing to hear Emma's squeals of self gratification any longer than necessary.

Liz needed to find somewhere else reasonably private, quickly. The logical choice was the break room. Stefania was in there of course but she knew about the earrings so Liz didn't think that would be an issue.

"Hi, Courtney." Stefania said, automatically as her and Liz walked in. The Polish beauty immediately blushed with embarrassment as she remembered she wasn't supposed to know her. She had messed up again.

"Do I know you?" Courtney asked a little surprised. Stefania couldn't use the name badge excuse this time. She just looked at her blankly.

"Kind of." Stefania admitted.

"That's part of the reason I brought you here." Liz told her step-daughter. "Sit down please." A confused Courtney pulled out a chair and sat down. Liz put the earrings on the table. Liz took a deep breath. "Now Courtney the reason I asked you..."

"Code three hundred! Code three hundred!" Natalie's loud voice came out the PA intercom speaker, interrupting Liz.

"Shit!" Liz said. Natalie was requesting a manager urgently. She hoped Emma would deal with it but given what Liz had heard earlier she doubted it very much. She waited a few seconds. Nothing happened. "As I was saying..."

"Code three hundred! Code three hundred!" Natalie's voice was practically screaming into the microphone.

"Okay, don't go anywhere. I'll be right back." Liz said to Courtney who was also aware of the code meant. She nodded towards her step-mother. Liz shot off out the door.

Courtney turned to face Stefania and the two women smiled awkwardly at each other.

---

"I tried phoning Emma first," Natalie said, "but there was no answer." Her and Liz were near the front of the store surveying the damage. A car had mounted the pavement and hit one of the large windows at that faced the street. The window had stopped the car but had become badly cracked in the process.

There was an ambulance and police car outside. There was also a small crowd of onlookers. "Nobody was hurt, were they?" Liz asked. Natalie shook her head.

"No, the driver is getting checked though." Liz sighed.

"We only just fixed that window last year."

---

Thirty minutes later Liz was heading back to the break room. She had popped back to the office to phone the emergency glazier and contact head office about the accident. Emma was still locked in the toilet. While Liz was on the phone there was no sounds coming from the small room. She began to wonder if Emma had fell asleep in there.

Liz was getting ready to leave when the moaning started again. She wondered where Emma got the stamina from. Even in Alice's much younger body she'd been at it for several hours.

As Liz approached the break room she could hear the two young women talking and laughing. She was happy they had been keeping each other company. Upon entering she could see them sitting on both sides of a table. Stefania's glasses sat on the middle of it.

"Sorry about that. We had a bit of an emergency. As I was saying," Liz looked at the two women who were both smiling at her, "what?"

"Liz," Stefania said, "guess what? We've swapped bodies." She pointed at Courtney. Liz looked at them both a little confused. It was then she noticed the earrings in Courtney's ears.

"It's true." Courtney said. She picked up the large glasses and put them on her nose.

Stefania's body spoke again. "This is so cool." She was beaming. "I'm hot now!" Courtney's body nodded.

"It's going to be so much better for me too."

Stefania had unintentionally stolen Liz's new body from right under her nose.
1341511112.title: Liz contacts Courtney

There is an unexpected knock at the door
13415111121.content:
"But, but..." Liz stammered as she looked alternately at Stefania and Courtney.

"But, what?" Steven in Courtney's body asked. Liz thought about what she wanted to say. Did she actually want to admit, she had planned on taking Courtney's body for herself? Courtney might be upset with her but that was a pretty common situation. It had been worse when she was younger, with Liz being the 'evil' step-mother. It had got better as Courtney matured but she still had her moments. "I thought that's what you had in mind when you brought Courtney here. When you brought the earrings, I was certain of it. I took it upon myself to explain the earrings, she was sceptical at first."

Courtney stepped into the conversation. "He got me to ask questions only he'd know the answer to. He answered them all correctly. The thought of this hot body being mine was a no brainer to me, so we swapped."

Liz put her hand over her mouth. Steven actually believed Liz had brought Courtney here for him to do a swap with. Steven continued talking to Liz. "You knew I was struggling being in that body." He pointed at Courtney in Stefania's body. "This was amazingly kind of you Liz. You are such a thoughtful person."

"Yeah," Courtney agreed, "I'm glad you thought of giving me this body before anyone else. It's really sexy. Have you heard this accent?"

"Yes, well just doing my bit." Liz lied with a smile.

"Oh thank goodness." Steven said. "I had started to worry I'd made some sort of mistake. We should really have talked about it with you first." Liz silently cursed him. She had expected him to sit there quietly till she got back. Why did he have to show some initiative for once, totally spoiling her plans.

"I had planned to discuss it beforehand, you know, explore," Liz paused, "the possibilities," she took a deep breath,"the consequences..." She noticed Courtney was wearing the badly fitting polo she'd gave Stefania. "You reset the awareness?"

Steven nodded. "Yeah I didn't really fancy the prospect of going home to an empty house. You've been so helpful about my sudden change. If I start to struggle again, it will be comforting to know we'll be under the same roof at home. Knowing me, I'll be around you so much, I'll be like your shadow."

"Great." Liz said without emotion. Normally, Courtney and her didn't interact much. Now Steven was going to be hovering around her at home. It would be a constant reminder of the swap that could have been. She didn't want to dwell on it too much. She turned to Courtney. The body didn't help when it came to unwanted attention. It just exuded sexiness, unlike Steven she was aware of the effects it had on her mind. "No I don't need change." Rob told her. "I wanted to talk about our discussion yesterday."

"I spoke to so many people yesterday." Courtney lied. "What did we discuss?"

"The romantic date we had planned..." Courtney had no idea what Rob was talking about. Had Steven organised this yesterday? He'd certainly worked fast after getting this body. Courtney certainly felt flattered but she wasn't ready for this, not so soon. "...when you get comfortable dating co-workers."

Courtney sighed with relief. Steven must have told Rob that he wasn't happy to date colleagues yet. It seemed Rob had made a lot of assumptions about the rest of that conversation. "That's not what I said Rob. You are nice and everything but..."

"It's okay, I can wait." He said. Courtney shook her head, he just wasn't getting it. "You look different with your contacts in. I think it makes your eyes prettier."

"Look, I don't think this is a suitable topic for a work based discussion." She said trying to shut him down.

"My, scanner is playing up." He said pointing to his device for reading bar-codes, in a poor attempt to keep the conversation work related.

"It probably just needs a clean." She said.

"I tried. It didn't seem to make much difference." He lied, desperate for Stefania to stay and talk to him.

"Did you try cleaning it with a wipe?" She asked. He looked at her blankly. "There should be some under your console." Courtney stretched out and leaned forward reaching under the till. Her large breasts touched Rob's thighs. She couldn't locate the wipes. She moved her hand around under the till trying to feel for them. This caused her breasts to rub across Rob's thighs. She didn't notice as she was focussed on finding the wipes. Rob certainly did notice. He also noticed the growing hardness in his underpants.

Rising up slightly, she turned to face him. They were both surprised at the proximity. She put her hand on the back of his chair for support. Their faces now only a short distance apart, the sexual tension was measurable. Courtney smiled at him, Rob smiled back. "Found them." She said pulling out the tub of wipes. She opened the container and removed one.

She still had to lean over to reach the scanner but not quite as far as before. She supported herself on the ledge around the the till seat. Her breasts were now in Rob's eye-line. She started ferociously rubbing the lens of the scanner. This oscillation transferred through her body to her chest. Rob couldn't help but stare at Stefania's large mammaries as they jiggled from side to side. Trying to distract himself he looked further down her body, her shirt had fell away from her stomach. Its smooth and slim nature was revealed. He kept moving his eyes across her body.

Unconsciously Courtney was wiggling her ass sexily in time to her wiping the scanner. "Oh, Christ!" Rob said unable to contain his sexual feelings. Courtney stood up again. She looked at the wipe.

"Wow! It was really dirty. You should really take better care of it. It is a sensitive piece of equipment after all." Courtney said innocently. Rob nodded, now unable to speak. His face was straining. "Something wrong? More cramp?" A concerned Courtney asked as she put her hands on her hips.

"No!" Rob yelped as he just about just gathered enough willpower to stop himself creaming his underwear.

"Good, so no more alerts, unless it's important." He nodded. Courtney turned around. Every other till alert light was going. The operators were all pointing at their scanners.
