1341511112111111111121.content:
Two of the shelf stackers were on their break. Natalie had asked Courtney to cover the staff members till the end of it and she happily complied. The shelf stackers of course suspected someone would be covering the break and so had left the cages containing the heaviest stock till last.

Courtney sweated as she put the heavy tins of paint on to the shelf. As much as some workers in the shop were better than others when it came to work ethic, it was quite clear to her, that most of them had their own little skives. Even the newest workers had found little ways of getting someone else to do the hard work.

It didn't help matters that Stefania's body didn't seem to have done a lot of physical work recently. Courtney could see that from looking at her muscles. After so much heavy paint, the perspiration was running down her body. "Hi luv." Liz said as she approached.

She had decided to get out the office. As much as Liz and Emma had always got on, since Emma had swapped, Liz was finding it difficult to spend long periods of time with her. All she seemed to talk about was sex, body swapping, tattoos and more sex, Liz was growing weary of it.

"Hi Liz." Courtney said as she stood up. She grabbed the hem of her polo and pulled it up to wipe the perspiration off her face. In the process she managed to reveal her belly and most of her shapely back. The skimpy bikini top Liz had given Steven yesterday for underwear, was even partially visible.

Courtney was sure she heard something that sounded like half a dozen sexual gasps nearby but when she turned round nobody was visible. She slowly turned back round and let her polo top drop back down.

Liz noted how casually Courtney displayed her skin. She would have put it down to Stefania's original personality but she'd seen both Steven and Emma show similar behaviour. It looked like earrings lowered some inhibitions. "You still wearing that bikini?" She asked her swapped step-daughter.

"It's surprisingly comfortable," she said as she cupped her breasts without thinking, "and I couldn't find any other underwear at Steven's. At least not women's underwear anyway."

"So it was just Steven's clothes?" Liz asked.

"Yeah but they fit me okay. They were men's clothes but they were clearly designed to fit a curvy woman. I'm wearing a pair of his underpants," she grinned, "apart from the wide waistband they aren't much different from some of my knickers." Liz nodded. Emma had said all her clothing had adjusted to Alice's body.

"He has your clothes at home too. I think clothes are meant to swap with you but you two resetting the awareness might have done something to upset that. The earrings seem to be quite quirky anyway. It's almost like they have a mind of their own." Liz looked around. "You haven't seen Liam, have you?" She asked.

"Natalie was keeping an eye on him. He was in the warehouse, I think I seen him going outside."

"Getting out of work again, no doubt." Liz said cynically.

"To be fair I'm sure he was due a break. Natalie said she was quite surprised how hard he'd been working. She was a bit annoyed, he forgot his boots." Liz knew exactly why that was. She didn't have much sympathy given his usual attitude.

"Typical Liam, he has too mess up somehow."

"I saw him when I went by earlier. He looked quite comical trying to move the pallets about, wearing that tight skirt. I don't know what possessed him to dress in that." Liz again was aware this was due to the swap between Liam and Rose. The world saw him as a guy but in Rose's body he was a 'guy' wearing women's clothes.

"Liam's in a skirt?" Liz faked her surprise. "I really should speak to him about being out of uniform." She knew it was only because of the swap. She was keen to find out what other people thought.

"Yeah it crossed my mind too, but I figured as long as it was a one off and didn't happen again, I'd let it go this time. It actually looked sort of okay on him." Liz looked at her sceptically. Standard policy was to send staff home or try and locate suitable clothing in store. "I mentioned it to Natalie, she agreed as he would be mostly in the warehouse and not customer facing." Courtney told her, justifying what seemed like reasonable decisions.

"Yeah, I suppose." Liz reluctantly agreed. It seemed the earrings were making people jump through all sorts of logical hoops to try and rationalise swapped people's strange behaviour.

Something caught her attention in the distance. "Oh, talk of the devil." Liz said loudly as Liam and Rose came walking back in together. Both looked a little distracted. "What have you two been up to."

"Nothing, just talking." Liam said defensively.

Courtney stepped nearer them. "I was just telling Liz about your cute skirt." She said.

"Aye, ah ran oot of clean troosers, it's awe ah had left." He said in his Scottish accent that he got from Rose. He hoped he could dispel Courtney's interest.

"I see, did you run out of clean socks too, is that why you are wearing tights?" She asked smiling, as she gently poked fun at him. Liam scowled.

"Okay, that's enough." Liz said. She didn't mind embarrassing Liam a bit but the swap wasn't his fault. "Stefania, why don't you take Liam back to the warehouse. Natalie's in there, she'll find something for him to do."

Liam pointed to the warehouse door that was only about ten steps away. "It's just ower there." He said, not wanting another escort.

"Knowing you, you'd still manage to get lost on the way there." Liz told him. She pushed her arms out and shooed him and Courtney away. This left her alone with Rose who was looking at the paint tins she had to stack. Liz had been wanting a quiet word with her. She turned to her. "How you doing luv?" She asked the swapped girl.

"I've had better days." She said.

"Yeah, I suppose it's a lot to deal with." She looked at the cage of stock. "You shouldn't have any trouble with this lot. Liam's body isn't in the best of condition but he'll have more upper body strength." Rose nodded. She kept herself fit but she did avoid exercises that bulked her up, to avoid looking more masculine. This meant her arm and shoulder muscles weren't particularly strong.

"I'm still just taking it all in." Rose admitted.

"I'm a little jealous." Liz admitted.

"You are?" Rose asked.

Liz leaned in closer and spoke quietly. "You get a penis. That will be a brand new experience for you. I know it's Liam's but it should be a lot of fun to try out." She winked and nudged Rose's arm with her elbow, keen the young women got the most out of her new body. Liz was of course unaware that it wasn't as new or as fun an experience for Rose as she thought it was.

Rose sighed as she pick up a tin of paint and put it on the shelf.
1341511112111111111121.title: Follow Courtney on the shop floor

13415111121111111111215.content:
Liz was passing the front entrance just as Kyle, Emma's husband walked into the store.

"Hi Kyle." She said as she walked up to him. "What are you doing here?"

"Emma phoned me. She asked me to come in and see her." He said. Liz figured Emma must have phoned him after she had gone downstairs. Liz began to grow a little suspicious.

"Oh she did, did she? I thought you'd be working."

"I am, this is my lunch break. She said it was urgent." He informed her.

"Well, I won't hold you up any longer." She said about to walk away.

"Actually, Emma said I had to get," he paused for a few seconds recalling the name, "Luke to show me to the office."

"But you know the way." A confused Liz said.

"Emma said it was new procedure or something. I had to be accompanied." Liz was very suspicious now. "Emma said I should ask for Luke, she was quite insistent."

"I bet she was." Liz said, knowing exactly what Emma was up to. Luke was a good choice. He was young, attractive and fit. He had some nice toned muscles too.

"What?" A confused Kyle asked.

"Oh, nothing. I'll just get him for you." Kyle waited as Liz disappeared down one of the aisles. She returned about a minute later with the young man. "This is Emma's husband." Luke smiled and half waved. "Will you accompany him to the manager's office, please." Luke was a little confused but wasn't going to complain about being given a little skive like this.

"Sure." Luke said. "This way Mr. Thompson" He pointed in the direction of the door marked 'Staff Only'

A devious smile grew on Liz's face as Luke and Kyle headed out the door.

---

Emma had told Luke to wait outside when they got to the office. She explained Kyle wouldn't be long and Luke was to take him back downstairs again, when he was finished. She quickly shut the door in Luke's face.

Luke waited patiently. He could hear the murmur of conversation. He started to get bored after ten minutes or so and walked from side to side. There were a couple of chairs for visitors but he was reluctant to use them. He didn't want to get caught sitting down. Eventually he cautiously sat on one of the chairs, just as the office door opened. A frightened Luke quickly stood back up again.

It was Emma at the door. "Hi Luke." She said. She seemed to be looking him up and down. "Kyle will just be a couple of minutes." Luke could see him in the office. He was looking towards Luke too. Emma turned to Kyle. He seemed to be checking Luke out as well. Their body language seemed strange to him. Kyle nodded to Emma, who turned back round. "There's one more thing. Put your hand out." Luke did as he was asked.

Emma dropped the earring into it. "I was wondering if you could put that on." Luke was a little surprised by her request. "It's okay, it clips on."

"But..." He started to say.

"I don't have time to explain. Just put it on." Emma said in a forceful manner. As forceful as she could manage in Alice's voice anyway. Luke put the earring on. Emma smiled. "Good, now take a seat while you wait for it."

"Wait for what?"

"Uh, wait for Kyle coming out." Emma realised she'd nearly gave the game away. She closed the door again.

Just as Luke sat down he spotted another worker coming along the corridor towards the office. It was Kiran, the short young woman who strode towards him.

"You in trouble or something?" She asked him as she approached the office. Luke shook his head.

"I'm waiting on someone. What are you doing here?" He asked.

"It's strange." She said cryptically. She looked from side-to-side around Luke's head. He felt a pang of embarrassment. Kiran had obviously spotted the feminine piece of jewellery. "Liz sent me, she said you'd be wearing an earring and I was to get it from you." She looked quite surprised. "And here you are wearing one. It's weird. How did Liz know?" Luke shrugged.

"What are you going to do with it?" He asked as he removed it and handed it to the woman. He was happy for an excuse to get rid of it. He felt stupid wearing it.

"Well that was strange as well. Liz told me to put the earring on." Kiran put on the earring.

"How long for?" Luke asked.

"No idea." She said, just as everything in the corridor went fuzzy for a few seconds.

Luke blinked. Kiran had disappeared and Emma's husband was where she had been standing. The office door opened and Kiran came out. When did she go in there? Luke wondered. She handed her earring to Kyle.

Kiran turned to Luke. "I better go talk to Liz. I'll catch you later." Unknown to Luke, Kiran was in Kyle's body. The middle-aged man's body wandered back down the corridor.

Emma's husband stood there looking confused. He looked downwards. He placed his hands on his small breasts. Looking somewhat shocked Kyle spoke. "I'm a gi..." Before he could finish speaking, a panicked looking Emma had grabbed Kyle and pulled him back into the office. She gave Luke a strange stare before she slammed the door behind him.
13415111121111111111215.title: Kyle enters the store

choices: “How about we try it between ourselves?”
134152.content:
“...stupid bra, always getting in the bloody way...”

Liz sighed as Steven ripped off yet another lacy undergarment and discarded it to the side. They’d both snuck into Elizabeth’s former digs and had torn into the piles of assorted clothing dumped there. Though it’d been relatively easy to pick out a reasonably presentable red polo that was just about large enough to accommodate his new proportions, it was proving nearly impossible to satisfy the bodyswapped assistant supervisor. Each bra was too chafing, each pair of slacks was too tight and each set of footwear was too constricting. Eventually after a handful more painful tries to appease She-Steven, Liz decided to just whip out a skimpy two-piece bikini set that hadn’t sold the previous summer and chucked it Steven’s way, consequences be damned.

“What the hell is this? I’ll look like a bloody whore if anyone sees me!” Steven moaned.

“Oh relax, you big crybaby. No-one’s gonna see it underneath the uniform anyway so why does it matter?! Look, that’s the last item of lingerie that you haven’t chucked back into my face so, like it or lump it, you’re wearing it!” Steven sarcastically mocked Liz’s voice as he slipped the swimsuit on, prompting her to roll her eyes in return. “Whatever,” Liz chuckled sardonically as she watched Steven struggle to pull the polo over his head. As she observed him squirming and writhing she had to resist her urge to cuff him over the back of the head while he was haplessly defenceless. Instead she strode to his side and helped him like a good friend would, struggling to contend with Steven’s constant wriggling but gradually pulling the shirt over his head.

“Thanks,” he mumbled as his cheeks turned rosier. He pushed his glasses back onto the bridge of his nose and yelped as he peeked downwards. No wonder why, the polo that’d seemed to be able to fit beforehand barely made it down to his midriff, making him look like a pale-complexioned Indian belly dancer or just your average English sket. Steven screeched piercingly as he frantically tried to pull the material downwards.

“Oh no, Liz, no way am I wearing this outside of this room!”

Imagine Steven’s face as he watched Liz try (unsuccessfully) to stifle her laughter by covering her mouth in her palms. “C’mon, luv, you’re overreacting,” she squealed between short bursts of laughter. “Honestly, I think it suits you. Anyway, I’m not helping you to put another one on again, you nearly took out my eye the first time! Just take these bottoms I found you and stop complaining!”

Steven grumbled as he took the slacks in his dainty hands and pulled them on. “God, I look like a 70’s Charlie’s Angels reject.” He whined unceremoniously as he twirled in the breezy bellbottomed trousers. “Stop being a drama queen,” Liz taunted as she nearly reached bursting point. To add insult to injury, Emma decided to make her presence known at that very exact moment and she was immediately dumbfounded by Steven’s...interesting clothing ensemble.

“How did...? Why did you...? You know what, never mind. I just came here to hand you this.” Emma passed him a laminated piece of card, his new name tag, and Steven eagerly clipped it on. Liz, ever the eagle eyed supervisor, was the first to notice a slight amendment to the text on the name tag. “Emma, how come it says ‘Stefania’ instead of Steven?”

Emma smacked her forehead as she realised her mistake. “Sorry, luv, must’ve been a typo! I’ll go back and get another one printed out...”

“No,” Steven said in a surprisingly stoic tone. Emma and Liz stopped in their tracks. “I mean, no, it’s fine, Emma. Maybe assuming a new identity is the best thing, at least for now. I don’t want anyone outside this circle knowing about what went on with me. Until we can locate my old body, I guess I can pretend to be ‘Stefania’ for a bit.”

“Quick question: do I still get the salary of an assistant supervisor?”

“Well, yes, but if you’re gonna be working in the store with the others, you might not qualify...”

“Then it’s settled!” Steven skipped out of the room, humming a pleasant little tune to himself while his trouser legs billowed underneath him. Meanwhile Emma and Liz looked to one another, holding off for a second before exploding into raucous laughter. Liz wiped a joyful tear from her eye before presenting the golden earrings in her right palm to Emma. “So what do we do now?” she asked.

“Well...”
134152.title: Reader's choice

1341524.content:
"Let's kill two birds with one stone" Emma said. She looked at her watch. "There is a tea break change over coming up. Take Stefania up to the break room. You can introduce her to two groups of workers. While you are up there you can scope out some potential swap candidates."

"What a great idea." Liz said.

"That's why they pay me the big bucks or they are supposed to at least." Emma said, somewhat dissatisfied with her current salary.

"Could be worse." Liz said.

"Yeah, I could be the manager at the Barnsley store. Poor soul." Liz nodded in agreement.

"What about the rest of the staff? How will they find out about our new assistant supervisor?" Liz asked.

"Just get the workers you talk to, to pass it on that there is a new staff member."

"I probably won't have to, you know the way gossip travels around this place."

---

There was a constant stream of talking and laughter coming from the break room as Liz and Stefania walked down the corridor. Liz went in first, there were a few glances in her direction but the noisy talking continued. When Stefania stepped inside, you could have heard a teaspoon drop.

The men looked dumbstruck. She quickly looked around the room from side to side. Her exaggerated head movement seemed to be in slow motion to her male audience. It gave the impression they were in some sort of shampoo advert. Unconsciously she removed her glasses which just added to the effect.

Her female audience stared silently for different reasons with the possible exception of Allie.

"Everyone if I could have your attention for a moment." Liz said loudly although she didn't have to.

"Is this work related? because we don't get paid for breaks." Asked Michael in a militant mood.

"Yes but I'll be brief. Just remember who pays for your free tea, coffee and fridge when you are on your unpaid break." Liz said, shutting him down. She smiled at everyone. "I want to introduce you to Stefania our new temporary assistant supervisor."

"Has Steve been sacked then?" Asked Aaron. Before getting a response he continued. "No surprise, I can understand why."

Several of the others nodded. "Yeah he was pretty useless." Said Charlotte. Stefania bit her tongue.

"Steven has not been sacked." Liz said loudly, she could see the annoyed look on Stefania's face. "He's been sent on staff training. Stefania is training here before going to another store."

"Which one?" Asked Aaron. Liz hadn't thought of one when she was putting together this hastily concocted cover story.

"Barnsley!" She practically spat out. There was a large amount of sympathetic murmuring throughout the group. "Well I'll let her introduce herself. Stefania took a step forward feeling very self conscious in her new attire.

"Hi everyone. I look forward to working with you." Again most of the men were spellbound by the sweet sounds coming from her mouth.

"You're Polish?" Kiran asked from the far end of the room.

Stefania nodded. "I think so, Kiran." She said.

"Wait, how do you know my name?" She asked.

Stefania started to panic. She'd almost blown it already. "I read it on your name badge." She said proudly, impressed at her own cleverness.

"What, from over there? They must be really good glasses."

---

The break period had barely been over two minutes when Natalie came storming into the manager's office. She nearly caught Emma finishing the pile by putting on her last King. "What's this about Steven being replaced? Shouldn't I be told about this?" An angry Natalie demanded to know.

"Liz was right, word does travel fast." Emma said as she sat upright.

"What?"

"Sorry luv, it was one of those last minute things. I didn't get much notice myself. She just appeared in our office this morning. It caught me and Liz by surprise too." She said honestly.

"Oh well, I see." Said Natalie, calming down a little.

"Have you met the replacement yet?" Natalie shook her head.

"I've heard conflicting stories. Some of the staff were saying she's very beautiful and very friendly. Others said she was rude and standoffish."

"So you've been talking to male and female staff, I'm guessing."

"How did you know?"

"Never mind. Her and Liz will still be in the break room if you want to talk to her yourself."

She considered the idea. It would be a great excuse to be off the shop floor. It was her manager's idea after all. "I might just do that." She was about to turn to head out.

"Before you go luv, tell me what you think of these." Emma said as she pulled out the earrings.
1341524.title: “You decide.” (Reader’s Choice)

choices: Listening to Emma and Natalie’s conversation
Liz ponders what swaps could be made
13415242.content:
While Emma slyly persuaded Natalie to try on the earring, Steven was having a difficult time trying to adjust to his new predicament. He’d left the break room temporarily to try and get some work done, leaving Liz to sip her tea on her lonesome. His work wasn’t that hard all things considered—though he still preferred to work down and amongst his colleagues, his role as a supervisor had slashed his workload in half. No, the thing that perturbed him the most were the looks he was receiving from all sides. He’d noticed at least a dozen men glance his way and size him up, many of which had stars in their eyes and one brazen fella even had the nerve to catcall him. He blushed profusely, too embarrassed and too uncomfortable to react to any of them.

The worst culprits by far were his own coworkers. While many of the women stared at him purely for the sake of sizing up their new superior (Allie being the exception; her glances were a lot more lustful than anything else), the men looked at him for one reason and one reason only. And to be fair to them, Steven couldn’t blame them. Heck, had a beautiful Eastern European girl been hired at the store a day before he had little doubt he wouldn’t have been slobbering over her. Steven swore under his breath as he walked into the canned goods aisle. Though the loosely cut bell bottoms provided plenty leeway for his supple legs to move, the skimpy thong underneath them clung to him tighter than stink on rice. He grumbled as he slipped his dainty hand inside to try and readjust it’s position, rummaging around whilst his other hand reached high to place a can of baked beans onto the top shelf.

There seemed to be no suitable placement though and after a few dozen seconds without success Steven grew frustrated. A customer looking for some canned peas strode into the aisle but soon strolled right back out, seeing a very out of context scene indeed. Steven meanwhile was still going ham on the bikini thong, using both hands now to pull the restrictive material out from his buttcrack. Fortunately or unfortunately, depending on the reader’s perspective of the ensuing incident, Steven’s hand somehow slipped as it moved through and his manicured fingers brushed against the edge of his clit, sending a fuzzy vibration coursing through his body from the soles of his feet to the crown of his head.

“Uh...” Steven moaned slightly. Wow. Is that what female arousal felt like? Steven swivelled his head from side to side to make sure no one was watching him. Although he wanted to try and experience that feeling again, he didn’t want to be caught by a customer, or even worse, a coworker, and have to try and explain his way out of an awkward moment. Curiosity beat out caution and Steven was mere moments from trickling his fingers back inside his front when he heard a light cough over his shoulder. He reacted poorly to the surprise, stumbling in the heeled ballet flats Liz had lent to him, and would’ve fallen to the ground had the stranger not caught him in their arms.

“Woah, sorry there,” their familiar voice said as they levered Steven back upright. It turned out that the person was no stranger but was actually Luis. The Dominican born man watched silently as Steven brushed himself off and adjusted his glasses back into place.

“So sorry if I startled you, chica,” he said in an easygoing Dominican tone. “Sorry, I meant to say ‘ma’am’. Excuse my informality, Miss...”

“Stefania. Just Stefania.” Steven held out his hand to shake but Luis instead kissed it, eliciting a shy blush and a nervous giggle from him. “And there’s no need to call me ‘Miss’ or anything like that. Think of me as just another coworker who’s covering for the assistant supervisor until he comes back.”

Hopefully soon, he grumbled internally.

Luis chuckled. “How can I think of a sweet little jévon like you as just another coworker?” Steven blushed again and cursed himself for it. Why did this body get so flustered at every single ambiguous example of flirtation? Luis noticed ‘Stefania’’s rosy cheeks and grinned partially. “Sorry about that, we Dominicans are natural flirts. Can’t help myself. Anyways, I just came over ‘cause I saw you struggling to put that can on the shelf. Here, let me help.” Steven silently passed it over and watched as Luis stretched up and positioned effortlessly. Steven couldn’t help but observe Luis’ athletic figure ripple underneath the standard red polo, his tanned biceps straining the seams. Steven didn’t even blame his new form for admiring Luis—no homo but that dude was built like an Olympic cyclist.

“There you go, Miss Stefania. Holler at me if you need anything else, y’hear?” Steven nodded and thanked Luis as he stepped out of the aisle. He breathed a huge sigh of relief knowing Luis hadn’t seen anything. He still had the urge to experiment with his new equipment but seeing as how close he’d got to getting busted before he didn’t think it was the wisest idea yet.

For now at least he’d try to keep his head down and stay out of people’s way as much as possible. He pulled the thong out once more and moved onto the next task set for him.

134152421.content:
Emma sighed. She had asked Natalie several times to try on one of the earrings and she had refused.

"They aren't really my style." The supervisor said a little frustrated by her manager's insistence. Emma sighed again.

"Well I suppose I better come clean then. I do have an ulterior motive." She admitted. Natalie looked at her confused. "This should be on a need to know basis but you are the most senior member of staff after Liz. You are higher up the totem poll than Steven, after all and he knows obviously."

"Knows what?" A confused Natalie asked.

"Sorry, luv. They are magical earrings." Emma informed her.

"They are nice I suppose, if you like that kind of thing but I wouldn't say they were magical."

"I mean, magical like hocus pocus." Emma waved her hands around like she was casting a magic spell. Natalie stared at her.

"Are you feeling okay Emma?" A concerned Natalie asked. "The stress of the job getting to you? I know it can be tough at the top."

"You don't believe me?" Emma asked, a little disappointed. Natalie shook her head. "They can swap bodies. Steven has already used them. Don't you think it's a bit of a coincidence his replacement who has suddenly appeared has a very similar name?" She asked.

"Are you trying to tell me Stefania is really Steven in a different body?" Emma nodded. "What sane woman would want to swap bodies with Steven?" She asked, which she followed with a nervous giggle. In her mind the whole thing was preposterous. She did find the idea a little intriguing though.

"You want proof then?" Emma asked. She slipped one of the earrings into her ear. She pulled open her drawer pulling out her make up mirror and put it in her hand.

"I think that would be a reasonable request." Natalie said. She was a little concerned she might be fuelling Emma's delusion. Hopefully when she saw it didn't work, she would see the whole idea was silly. Emma walked round the desks and handed her the other earring. Unaware of the compulsion, Natalie slipped the earring on.
